channel.title: Text Color
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering if there was already a tutorial or something on how to change in-game preset text color for a client. It is at defult at the moment, and I wanted to change to purple.
Any comments/help is greatly appreciated.
_Tanner

item.title: Text Color
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

This will change regular text color? Without adding prefixes to the chat. like Red: Hello. vs. Hello.

Read full topic

item.title: Text Color
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

If you have non-renamed go to your client.java (CLIENT SIDE)
find this

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(0, aStringArray944[k], i1, 822, 4);

replace it with this

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method389(false, false, 4, 0, aStringArray944[k], i1);
now compile and run then if u want to try ::yell @whi@ MoparScape Forum Ftw. (Exemple).

Read full topic
